channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- lldptool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- lldptool

item.title: CVE-2018-10932|2024-08-05T07:54:35.554Z -- intel -- lldptool
item.description: lldptool version 1.0.1 and older can print a raw, unsanitized attacker controlled buffer when mngAddr information is displayed. This may allow an attacker to inject shell control characters into the buffer and impact the behavior of the terminal.
